don=
't think that is going to work.  As I look at this document...

t.sourceforge.net/doc/cookstour/cookstour.htm

row exceptions ...but that exception is

ass in the framework.  So if I wrap

nd then rethrow it?  I

ults Formatter (Junit recipes, 7.6), but this might be biting
